name: Endless Rubber
description:
Roll out as a rogue tire and adventure as far as you can in this casual, side scrolling, one-button endless runner. Avoid gaping holes, hedges, boxes, killer attack dogs, and even the fallen corpses of your former comrades.

Features:

  • Handcrafted retro pixel art.
  • Original 8-bit chip tune soundtrack.
  • Simple, single button gameplay.
  • Compete competitively worldwide on the Steam Leaderboards.
  • Compete casually locally with Steam Cloud stats.
  • 5 actually obtainable Steam achievements for achievement hunters.
  • Loved by both children and dogs
  • Integrated indie dev support!

Thank you for your support! All purchases and donations go directly towards funding future projects. Feel free to add any comments or suggestions in our forums.

~BrainChocolate
